name: PlutusDAO
introduce: Plutus is an Arbitrum-native governance aggregator aiming to maximize users’ liquidity and rewards while simultaneously aggregating governance behind the PLS token. Plutus’ objective is to become the de-facto Layer 2 governance blackhole for projects with veTokens. Plutus has collaborated with Dopex, Jones, GMX and Sperax for a variety of Plutus-related governance products.
